name: scroll_typer
description: ## Overview: Scroll Typer is simply a typing game set to music.

scripts.dev: concurrently concurrently "npm run webpack" "npm run server" "npm run livereload"
scripts.pretty: prettier-eslint --write --list-different --bracket-spacing --no-config --print-width 100 --tab-width 2 --use-tabs --single-quote --trailing-comma es5 --arrow-parens always --semi '**/*.js' && prettier-eslint --write --list-different --bracket-spacing --no-config --print-width 100 --tab-width 2 --use-tabs --single-quote --trailing-comma es5 --arrow-parens always --semi '**/*.jsx'
